title: Round the twist: without my pants
creator_credit: Australian Children's Television Foundation, Antonia Barnard, Esben Storm and Paul Jennings
brief_description: Pete is inflicted with a bizarre speech defect. He compulsively adds the words “without my pants” to the end of every sentence with hilarious and embarrassing results.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Children’s Television Foundation, Antonia Barnard, Esben Storm and Paul Jennings
